description: Their best-selling, all-day pant, updated with an active-minded construction that offers a unique combination of performance and style. Incomparable fit, design, and versatility with new and improved features like articulated knees, a dedicated knife pocket, and an athletic fit that's up for anything. Made from a twill fabric that's comfortable, durable, and has excellent stretch.
name: Mountain Hardwear Hardwear AP Active Pants, Short - Mens
